text: Raymond Chow Man-wai, (; 8 October 1927 – 2 November 2018) was a Hong Kong movie producer, and presenter. He was known for promoting martial arts and the Hong Kong cinema onto the international stage. Chow was the founder of Golden Harvest, he produced some of the biggest stars of the martial arts movie genre, including Bruce Lee, Jackie Chan, and Tsui Hark. Chow died on 2 November 2018 at the age of 91.嘉禾创办人邹文怀去世 曾栽培李小龙成龙等巨星 ==References== ==Other websites== * Raymond Chow at HKcinemagic * CineAsia 2007 Awards Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Hong Kong filmmakers Category:Chinese movie producers Category:Television producers Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire
title: Raymond Chow
